rukus.text: 54|1|Kiyamata kachakachi hayeche [1], ara camda bidirna hayeche [2]
54|2|ara tara kono nidarsana dekhale mukha phiriye neya ebam bale, ‘eta to ciracarita jadu [1].’
54|3|Ara tara mithyaropa kare ebam nija kheyala –khusira anusarana kare, athaca pratiti bisaya'i sesa lakse paumchabe [1].
54|4|Ara tadera kache eseche sambadasamuha, yate ache kathora nisedhajna
54|5|eta paripurna hikamata, kintu bhitipradarsana tadera kono kaje lageni.
54|6|Ata'eba, apani tadera upeksa karuna. (Smarana karuna) yedina ah‌banakari ah‌bana karabe eka bhayabaha parinamera dike
54|7|apamane abanamita netre [1] sedina tara kabara hate bera habe, mane habe yena tara biksipta pangapala
54|8|tara ahbanakarira dike chute asabe bhita-bihbala haye [1]. Kaphirara balabe, ‘bara'i kathina e dina.’
54|9|Edera age nuhera sampradaya'o mithyaropa karechila--- sutaram tara amadera bandara prati mithyaropa karechila ara balechila, ’pagala’, ara take bhiti pradarsana kara hayechila [1].
54|10|Takhana tini tamra rabake ahabana kare balechilena, ‘niscaya ami asahaya, ata'eba apani pratibidhana karuna.’
54|11|Phale amara unmukta kare dilama akasera dbarasamuha prabala barsanasila baridharara madhyame
54|12|ebam mati theke utsarita karalama jharnasamuha; phale samasta pani milita hala eka parikalpana anusare [1]
54|13|ara nuhake amara arohana karalama katha o perega nirmita eka nauyane [1]
54|14|ya calata amadera cokhera samane; eta puraskara tamra jan'ya, yara sathe kuphari kara hayechila.
54|15|Ara abasya'i amara etake rekhe diyechi eka nidarsanarupe [1]; ata'eba upadesa grahanakari ke'u ache ki
54|16|sutaram ki kathora chila amara sasti o bhitipradarsana
54|17|ara abasya'i amara kura'anake sahaja kare diyechi upadesa grahanera jan'ya [1], eta'eba upadesa grahanakari ke'u ache ki
54|18|‘ada sampradaya mithyaropa karechila, phale kirupa chila amara sasti o satarkabani
54|19|niscaya amara tadera upara pathiyechilama eka pracanda sitala jharoha'oya nirabacchinna amangala dine
54|20|ta manusake utkhata karechila yena tara utpatita khejura gachera kanda.
54|21|Ata'eba ki kathora chila amara sasti o bhitipradarsana
54|22|ara abasya'i amara kura'anake sahaja kare diyechi upadesa grahanera jan'ya; ata'eba upadesa grahanakari ke'u ache ki
